
### Here you can see a wordcloud that represents the most frequent words based on gender. Legend: Blue - Male; Red - female; Purple - Other

```{r}
library(wordcloud)
gsum2<-read.table(paste0(urltodata,"gsum"), header=T,sep="")
gsum2<-as.matrix(gsum2)
colnames(gsum2)<-NULL
comparison.cloud(gsum2,scale=c(3,.01),max.words=300,colors=c("deepskyblue3","firebrick2","darkorchid3"))

```


### You can see a cluster dendrogram here

```{r}
library(cluster)
library(ape)


traindtm<-read.table(paste0(urltodata,"dtm"), header=T,sep="")
d<-dist(traindtm)
hc <- hclust(d,method="ward.D")
dtmdim<-dim(traindtm)
size<-15/dtmdim[1]
plot(hc, cex = size,main="",xlab="",ylab="",sub="")

```
